DOC.detailed_description: After 2-3 month Neonatal Intensive Care Unit ( NICU ) , mother father Very Low Birth Weight ( VLBW ) infant face discharge home trepidation . Having VLBW infant survive discharge , parent must perform myriad health care task home , yet parent often feel ill-prepared , uninformed , unskilled provide care . The goal exploratory research develop pilot NICU-2-Home service , health information technology ( IT ) concept center smart phone create researcher Motorola . NICU-2-Home provide support parent VLBW infant transition NICU home eventually establish medical home infant 's pediatrician . Phase 1 research use qualitative method iterative process design NICU-2-Home content service support parent transition home NICU interview major stakeholder : parent , neonatal physician , neonatal staff , community pediatrician . Phase 2 evaluates NICU-2-Home parent transition home include feasibility study randomization pilot test ability NICU-2-Home ( ) improve parent 's self-efficacy confidence care VLBW infant , ( b ) decrease parental stress , ( c ) enhance involvement VLBW infant compare control .
